data_suite_tagline: Universal validator and converter for JSON/CSV data.
welcome_desc: Universal validator and converter for JSON/CSV data.
feature_1: Convert between JSON and CSV instantly.
feature_2: Real-time JSON syntax validation and error pinpointing.
feature_3: Secure local processing: Your data never leaves your browser.
